com.smn.client

接口 IAMService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    IAMServiceImpl

    public interface IAMService
    The IAMService provides access to IAM related information
    版本:
    0.5.0
    作者:
    liuqiangqiang

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AuthBean getAuthentication()
      Obtain authorization information from the IAM service, which includes projectId, user token, and token expiration time
      void setDomainName(java.lang.String domainName)
      set the name of domain
      void setIamUrl(java.lang.String iamUrl)
      set the url of iam
      void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
      set the password of user
      void setRegionId(java.lang.String regionId)
      set the id of region
      void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
      set the user of name.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAuthentication

        AuthBean getAuthentication()
                    throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Obtain authorization information from the IAM service, which includes projectId, user token, and token expiration time
        返回:
        AuthBean User token information
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Failed to get token, then ran out of the exception

      • setUserName

        void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)
        set the user of name.
        参数:
        userName - the name of user

      • setPassword

        void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        set the password of user
        参数:
        password - the password of user

      • setDomainName

        void setDomainName(java.lang.String domainName)
        set the name of domain
        参数:
        domainName - the name of domain

      • setRegionId

        void setRegionId(java.lang.String regionId)
        set the id of region
        参数:
        regionId - the id of region

      • setIamUrl

        void setIamUrl(java.lang.String iamUrl)
        set the url of iam
        参数:
        iamUrl - the url of iam
